::Shadow Wing::

She could sence the feelings and shock that ran through Veratis' mind.
"Veratis, what happened? How is it that I can communicate with you, 
but I can't move my body? How is this possable?"

She was starting to get scared.  She never comprehended that this 
sort of thing was even possable, let alone happen to her.  She 
wondered if this was a perminant state that she would have to live 
with, or was it temporary?  She felt an influx of power as her body 
started to change physically.  White hair started to grow on her head 
and wings started to grow from her shoulder blades.  

She paniced and screamed in her mind.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Veratis was in shock, Shadow Wing was somehow communicating with 
him without
> the use of receptors.
> 
> "How are you doing this?" he asked trying to control his shock. If 
she could
> truly read his mind she'd sense wonder, confusion, curiosity, and a 
bot who
> was truly at a loss for words. His experiments somehow gave her 
abilities
> she hadn't had in her old form.
